body:
Hrm. It's not amazing, but I guess it'll have to do.

This is all messy, because what normally happens is that the message wraps. This is what we do for normal notification bars. It seems that this is broken in the heartbeat notification. I'm not clear on why. I suspect the flex=0 setting on the messageText, but if I remove that my nightly OOMs (!). So uh, yeah. On the other hand, flex=1 looks like it would 'push' the stars away (if present), which the comments in the code say we're explicitly trying to avoid. So rock, meet hard place, I guess. The new flexbox model lets you deal with this in a saner way, I think...
